snippet: Senator Olympia J. Snowe’s decision left former governors, members of Congress and many others weighing campaigns.
abstract: Surprise retirement of Sen Olympia J Snow sets off frantic political calculations throughout Maine, with former governors, members of the state’s Congressional delegation and many others hurriedly weighing runs for office that they had previously ruled out; several new candidates have already begun gathering the 2,000 certified signatures necessary to qualify for the Senate primary ballot.

byline.contributor: Jess Bidgood contributed reporting from Boston, and Murray Carpenter from Belfast, Me.

lead_paragraph: Senator Olympia J. Snowe’s decision left former governors, members of Congress and many others weighing campaigns.

headline.seo: Maine’s Senate Race in ‘Chaos’ Without Olympia Snowe
headline.main: Retirement Throws Maine’s Senate Race Into ‘Chaos’
headline.print_headline: Retirement Throws Maine’s Senate Race Into ‘Chaos’
